comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

It's just ridiculous that an industry can buy off a few senators for a couple of million to avoid legislation that would cost them billions.

Lobbying needs to stop.

If a senator accepts money from a company that's a conflict of interest, and that senator should be recused from any legislation that concerns that company.
If we don’t do this now the economic medical hell of the next ten years will be our own doing

I’m so glad I’ll have the opportunity to vote against Kathleen Rice in the future. Anyone who votes against this, being the clear will of the voters with incredibly high support, should be removed from office

I would not only like to see Medicare able to negotiate drug prices, but also that the price Medicare negotiates be the maximum allowable charge for each drug.

Edit: for all insurance companies and self-pay.
Vote out the democrats 2022 They have gone back on every single promise

I am currently taking some REALLY old school epilepsy medication because it’s all I can afford. It’s very literally killing me, but I cannot afford $1k a month for the newer medication that doesn’t kill you from the inside.
Just had a president that wanted to do just this, but both parties in congress did not want to play ball, just like  criminal justice reform. I swear both parties are wings on the same bird.

Pharma has bought as many Congressmembers as Finance and Arms Dealers have.  Synema is just the tip of the iceberg; about 20 other Democratic Senators would be willing to take her place if the price was right.  The Republicans are bought across the board.
It is too late. Big pharma own Manchin and Sinema. So basically they control the entire government.
Imagine this being something thing that you have to consider voter for as a politician... This type of shit is how we got Trump.
Does Rep. Jayapal say this? Because that's the progressive whose opinion on what is possible right now actually matters.
Believe it when I see it fuckos.  It will probably be some half assed jankety last second scramble plan that doesn’t do much.  They can claim they did something in the next campaign though!
